resources.string: Double Tap to Enter the Low Vision mode
Hey there! Welcome to virtual eyes. This application will enable you to execute all your necessary tasks at one go.

Hello! Lets take a quick tour of virtual eyes. Feel your device and judge the corners of the screen. Tap at any corner to hear the feature implemented. Single tap will voice the function and long press on it will select it. Double tap to enter low vision mode.
Please put your subscription key to source file \"app/res/values/strings.xml\" to enable Vision API calls.
